SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface IProjectManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProjectManager
public interface IProjectManager
Manages BTO project operations including retrieval, filtering, and modifications by HDB Managers and viewing by users.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addProject(HDBManager manager)
    Adds a new project to the system under a specific manager.
    void
    editProject(Project proj)
    Edits the details of an existing project.
    void
    filterView(FilterSettings filters, HDBManager user)
    Applies filter settings to the project list for a user.

    Retrieves a list of projects filtered based on user settings.

    Retrieves a project by its name.

  • Method Details

    • getProject

      Project getProject(String projectName)
      Retrieves a project by its name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project
      Returns:
      the matching Project object, or null if not found

    • getFilteredList_Register

      List<Project> getFilteredList_Register(User user)
      Retrieves a list of projects filtered based on user settings.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose filter settings apply
      Returns:
      list of Project objects matching the filters

    • getProjectList

      List<Project> getProjectList(User user)
      Retrieves the full project list accessible to the user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user requesting the project list
      Returns:
      list of Project objects viewable by the user

    • viewAllProj

      void viewAllProj(User user)
      Displays all projects that the user has access to view.
      Parameters:
      user - the user requesting the list

    • updateFlatRooms

      boolean updateFlatRooms(Project project, FlatType flatType, int x)
      Updates the number of available flats of a given type in a project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to update
      flatType - the type of flat to adjust
      x - the new count of available units
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • addProject

      void addProject(HDBManager manager)
      Adds a new project to the system under a specific manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the HDB Manager creating the project

    • removeProject

      boolean removeProject(String nextLine)
      Removes a project, given its data line or identifier.
      Parameters:
      nextLine - the CSV line or identifier representing the project
      Returns:
      true if removal succeeded, false otherwise

    • filterView

      void filterView(FilterSettings filters, HDBManager user)
      Applies filter settings to the project list for a user.
      Parameters:
      filters - the FilterSettings criteria
      user - the HDB Manager applying the filter

    • editProject

      void editProject(Project proj)
      Edits the details of an existing project.
      Parameters:
      proj - the Project object with updated information

    • toggleVisibility

      void toggleVisibility(Project proj)
      Edits the details of an existing project.
      Parameters:
      proj - the Project object with updated information

    • writeToCSV

      void writeToCSV(boolean append)
